Description: For sale is a 2009 Gibson Les Paul Jr. Billie Joe Armstrong Signature Electric Guitar with original case. This instrument is in very good condition and in perfect working order. There are some scratches, dings throughout, and some wear on the back. Overall, I would give it a solid 8 out of 10 condition. With exception to the upgraded Gotoh bridge and truss rod cover, everything on the guitar is original. We do not have the original bridge or truss rod cover. There are no cracks, repairs, or issues. The neck is straight with no issues. The original frets are in excellent condition with no wear. The original case has a little wear but works great. SPECS: Nut Width: 1.67" 1st Fret: 0.80" 12th Fret: 0.90" Neck Type: Thin Finger Board: Rosewood Pickups: Original Weight: 7lb 10oz If you scroll all the way down to the bottom of the pictures you can see detailed pictures of the frets, any wear on the guitar, and the guitar taken apart.
